ygData.subject: Re: Stein - No more - Addendum
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry,  I thought you were generalizing.  To answer your question, Yes I would be upset too.  Most people I have met were glad that the item could be bought
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry, I thought you were generalizing. To answer your question, Yes I
would be upset too. Most people I have met were glad that the item could
be bought for cash, instead of traded for highly camped items. On the
bright side, He could always trade the dagger for a Glowing Black Stone +
Cash.

>
> My point is that the DIDN'T have money to waste. they sold other
> possessions, begged, borrowed, and stole to get the money for a stein
> to hold in their left hand. This patch is going to change it to a
> right hand item. Can you see how they might be upset?
